title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Detailed requirements gathering for the Brain-Computer Interface for Training platform is initiated. The focus will be on identifying target users (students, professionals, researchers), learning objectives (accelerated skill acquisition, memory enhancement, cognitive training), desired features (personalized learning paths, progress tracking, gamification, data visualization, real-time user feedback, adaptive learning algorithms), performance expectations (responsiveness, scalability, security with a focus on data privacy and GDPR compliance), any hardware requirements (compatible EEG devices, VR equipment if applicable), and constraints or considerations related to regulatory requirements, accessibility, and integration with existing platforms. The findings will be documented for further development. It would also be beneficial to establish a clear roadmap for the project's phases and milestones.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the BCI hardware interface, data processing pipeline, machine learning models, and user interface components.

title: Develop BCI Hardware Integration
description: Implement the software components required to interface with the BCI hardware and acquire brain signal data.

title: Implement Data Processing Pipeline
description: Develop the data processing pipeline to clean, preprocess, and extract relevant features from the acquired brain signal data.

title: Develop Machine Learning Models
description: Research, develop, and train machine learning models to analyze brain signal data and identify patterns associated with learning and skill acquisition.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the BCI training platform, including visualization of brain activity, progress tracking, and interactive learning modules.

title: Implement User Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop secure user authentication and authorization mechanisms to protect user data and ensure appropriate access controls.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement a scalable and secure database and data storage solution for storing user data, brain signal data, and machine learning models.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data, including encryption, secure communication protocols, and regular security audits.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline to automate building, testing, and deploying the BCI training platform.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive user acceptance testing to validate the functionality, usability, and performance of the BCI training platform.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and troubleshooting guides.
